website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for an eyebrow dye kit that's easy to use and produces reliable results that last, this one has its competitors beat.
pros: In as little as 2 minutes, this eyebrow dye kit that includes everything you need delivers exceptional color
cons: Doesn't last as long as other brands

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product so far! Doesn't come off unless you scrub hard with soap and water or use makeup remover. I got both the brown black and black...I mix them a little because the brown black doesn't have too much black but it is a really nice dark brown. Have been wearing for 4 days now, product lasts about 2 days. It's great! Very satisfied. Worth the $
customer_reviews.author: Leens1979

customer_reviews.title: Awesome MUST HAVE !!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered blonde was skeptical at first Bc almost all blonde products have a copper tint this was a taupe color and got darker the more product you added. Stayed on very well even after a shower! Awesome however I do recommend using a small angled precision brush w this instead of the applicator or the spoolie
customer_reviews.author: mamaV

customer_reviews.title: BAD SKIN REACTION
customer_reviews.text: I applied the product and about 10 minutes later my skin started to burn. They're accurate when they say it doesn't come off easily, but unfortunately it burned my skin pretty bad before I could remove it. The skin around my eyebrows is not only red, swollen, and hurts like hell... But it also removed some of the little eyebrows that I do have when removing it. This product may be great for some people but it just didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: chaynae

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: It's great! It last pretty well. I applied it the night before so I didn't have to worry about it the next morning. The applicator sucks and it has too much product on it so I advise not using it. I just dab some on my hand and use and angled brush. Brown/Black is perfect color for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mae Dioquino

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me but may work 4U
customer_reviews.text: Was really hoping it works, since they say it last for days. But unfortunetly it does not work if you have no eyebrows. It just looked liked brown paint and came off by the next day. The product would work great for those who have brows and want a fuller bolder brow. I gave it a few goes with different technique but all resulted into waking up with patchy painted brows. 1st pic freshly done. 2nd pic next morning. After showering the rest just came off. The product just didnt have any hair to hold on to.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last 3 days cuz of oily skin but still love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure that it could last more than 1 day, it definitely seems like it would but my skin is so oily even with an astringent before application that I wake up with half an eyebrow because of the way I sleep. Otherwise it is true to claim can touch my eyebrows or take off a pullover hoodie without fear of losing makeup. I totally recommend it even if I have to apply daily, better than Anastasia DipBrow which came off so easy. Another note was I was afraid regular make up remover wouldn't work and that I'd have to buy the $8 cleanser but my 98¢ wipes from Walmart did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, I've used this eyebrow gel for years and have always ordered directly from the website. I've bought both shades of blonde and brunette. I recently bought the brunette from amazon and it was the same shade as my blonde. I do not have a vehicle which is why I pay for amazon prime, it's just too hard for me to get around on the bus at 6 months pregnant and with my 8 month old son as well. So I'm stuck with this defective product. Just want my nice eyebrows back. :( and I dont have a lot of money either, this was a gift to myself.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to apply
customer_reviews.text: Decided to try this based on so many positive reviews, but ended up very disappointed. I found it almost impossible to apply this evenly, especially with the brush provided. It also did not stay on very long despite the product saying it lasts up to three days. When you live in 90+ degree weather and sweat a lot from being outside, this is not a good product to use. Overall, I Was never able to make this look good, it never stayed on long, so I finally gave up. Brow pencils are much easier, cheaper, and look better overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: however I was disappointed with the results
customer_reviews.text: I Was very excited to try this product, however I was disappointed with the results. I bought both the black brown and jet black after reading the reviews about the black brown not being dark enough. I followed the directions exactly and my eyebrows looked good, however by the afternoons my eyebrows disappeared. What is the sense in spending almost $50 for these two products if they were not going to last at least three days, as advertised. Seriously if I wanted this result, then I would have just used an eyebrow pencil or makeup. Such a waste and I can’t even return it because In my excitement and anticipation, I threw out the boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Charla C. Castianne

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a LONG way and IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: After reading other reviews, I wondered if this product would work. I purchased the recommended slant eyebrow brush at a drug store, placed only a small amount on the end, applied with small strokes, brushing after EACH application. It worked beautifully! I think the trick is to let the first application dry for several seconds before applying a bit more. This filled in my eyebrows and stayed on much longer than an eyebrow pencil. Best wishes!
customer_reviews.author: CO Mtn. Lady

customer_reviews.title: The best thing I've found thus far...
customer_reviews.text: I have very sparse brows. This is the best product I have used to give me natural looking eyebrows. The color is good and stays pretty true...not darker if apply more. It does not last more than a day, though it will stay on enough to give some eyebrows when i wake up in the morning. Pretty easy to use. If I apply it less than perfect, I simply use a cotton swab to correct. I find that I only use the extra tool if I have applied too much on one side. Would definitely recommend for those who are eyebrow challenged.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Nope, nope, nope! Not to replace daily brow routine
customer_reviews.text: I am very surprised at the good reviews! If you are looking to stiffen up your brows like you put wet dirt in them, this is for you. It does NOT draw lines on your skin and fill in the spots you would with a pencil. I even used my own angled brush, with very little product and followed all directions. So gross! Back to the dip brow and pencil!
customer_reviews.author: Sheena S

customer_reviews.title: If you have a good set of eyebrows and you just need to fill ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have a good set of eyebrows and you just need to fill them in, this is a perfect ptoduct. If you are looking for a product to "add brow" to your barely there brows, this product will have same unnatural effect as any other product. The only benefit is that it will last you all day without smudging off.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Probably not best product for me
customer_reviews.text: So this eyebrow gel would be great for someone with thick, nicely shaped eyebrows. It is rather thick, but if brushed in, it will add color and emphasize shape. For us folks with thin, sparse brows, it requires some effort to apply successfully. The thick gel has nowhere to go, so must be applied in a tiny amount and spread quickly and diligently to cover bare spots. Did not find it to be particualrly long-lasting. One issue I have is the color. I bought BLONDE, as I have naturally dark blonde hair with pale highlights. The color is MUCH darker than any other BLONDE I have ever pruchased. Because of that, I probably won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: California

customer_reviews.title: Lies
customer_reviews.text: This did not last even one day on me. Maybe because my skin gets oily throughout the day, but isn't that most people?! It rubbed off half way through my work day which was embarrassing. It does not apply as easily as they show in the videos either. It was more clumpy than I expected which made it hard to get precise brush strokes. It made the border of my shaping look like thick lines. And yes I did use a thin angled eyebrow brush to apply, not the brush that comes with the tube. Returned!!
customer_reviews.author: audrieann111

customer_reviews.title: Practice Makes Perfect
customer_reviews.text: i can't stress enough to practice the application and use a light hand. after a few greatly exaggerated eyebrows, i got the hang of it. thankfully just soap and water removed the first attempts. i was skeptical of the lighter than expected color i ordered when i saw the product in its applicator - black/brown. it is the perfect blend of not too harsh on the black and not to light for the brown. its the perfect color balance. the included spoolie applicator is the perfect tool for distributing and refining the gel to the perfect shape. much more natural result than the eye pencil i've been using.
customer_reviews.author: ang alexander

customer_reviews.title: So impressed
customer_reviews.text: Wow! My eyebrows are sparse and thin. Tired pencils and powders abs pother gels that seemed to just melt away after a few hours. I cannot say enough good things about this stuff! I applauded it at night and slept in it and my eyebrows didn’t budge! I cannot believe the staying power this has! I filled in my brows with the brush provided, then used an angled eyebrow brush to get a little more precision. It’ll take practice to master this, and once it’s it’s place and dry it’s hard to fix any mistakes, but I love it! I even tried rubbing it off with water and nope, didn’t budge. I think I finally found my lifetime eyebrow product!
customer_reviews.author: MamaG

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed! Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Was swayed by reviews but this turned out to be of no use. Not sure what's in the formula but it made my eyebrow hairs clump together, did not stay on as it claims to...one good wipe from a dry finger took my application right off! Does absolutely nothing on the sparse, hairless areas - which is where I really needed help! It's like it slides off from the hairless area despite my most careful application. Disappointed because so many rave about this and I thought this would be the answer to my eyebrow woes.
customer_reviews.author: heartfelt

customer_reviews.title: I really dislike the product
customer_reviews.text: I really dislike the product. Feels like glue on your brows. Pay attention to the return time. I used it once to see if I liked it and did not care for it. I thought to give a second try and disliked it even more. Not impressed on jownitngoes on or the color. I missed my window to return this product of which I will not use again. It is not all that the hype says. I prefer my elf pencil way more for $1.99 which is easy to use and stays on well and a fraction of the cost. They get you even if you buy it once. Not worth it.. gummy and hard to apply with precision.
customer_reviews.author: yanna

customer_reviews.title: love this - have been a customer for 2 years!
customer_reviews.text: Due to a really bad 'over'wax job a couple years ago my eyebrows are nearly gone. I am very active and was continually fighting the disappearing eyebrow after being at the gym or outside in the summer. This has been my savior!!!! I have had many compliments since I started using it and have given the Wonderbrow website out to many. Was super glad to see it now available to order on Amazon!! Takes a little bit to get used to how to apply it correctly. I highly recommend buying a separate thin brush to apply as the 'comb' that comes with it is almost useless. Love my browns now thanks to this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for thin or small brows
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have small/thin brows and this product is great for making my brows stand out. You just have to practice putting it on. It’s like a gel and puts a stain on your brows. Once it dries it sets and stays on a long time. You have to take it off with makeup remover or wash it with soap or cleanser. It won’t cone off with just water which I love because I don’t have to worry if I scratch or sweat. One thing is tecommend is using a brow pencil to line the edges of you want a definitive line. The brush is small but won’t define the end of the brow well.
customer_reviews.author: KGH

customer_reviews.title: Practice, Practice, Practice!
customer_reviews.text: I have used an eyebrow pencil for 20+ years, so I figured I would finally try something try a brow-gel ...this had a huge following, so why not. First Impression: eek! I’m so glad I bought an angled brush to use, instead of the wand, to get a more precise shape. Second Impression: I need more practice! Third: The blonde color is too dark for me. I’m a natural toe-head and my eyebrows (and eyelashes) are a very light blonde. So, I’m not sure how much I’ll be using this product (::sad face::). Maybe they can make an “albino” shade?? That may work better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Katie W

customer_reviews.title: I'ts odd to use two brushes.
customer_reviews.text: I find it odd to put it on with a fingernail polish brush. That's how it comes. And then take the other brush (not attached to anything) to smooth it out. I mean what do I do with the second brush? Just throw it in a drawer? You don't need two. I thought maybe you took the one attached brush off and could add the other brush but no you can't. My husband tried to pull the one off the applicator but it doesn't come off. Another brand has just one brush and is much easier. It does work well though. And the color is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: The packaging tricks you into thinking that your bottle is ...
customer_reviews.text: The packaging tricks you into thinking that your bottle is filled. It was gone in a week. I think its only filled halfway or even less. I was so surprised that it was all gone after a week and half and I did not even use it that much. Then its just all dry after and cant even use it. I will not purchase this anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Last throughout workout!
customer_reviews.text: It actually works! It does NOT last 2 or 3 days (or whatever it claims), but it stays throughout my incredibly sweaty kickboxing class (and I sweat alot!!) But it comes right off when I wash my face. I don't scrub my eyebrows when washing, but the soap still manages to take it off. Otherwise I'm pretty impressed with the product. Anything that can last throughout a good workout deserves at least 4 stars (I would give it 5 if it lasted just once after a wash). Also the color looks odd in the bottle but much better once on. I bought brunette and my eyebrows are light brown. UPDATE - this only lasts about a month : (
customer_reviews.author: Leah C

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stuff! I applied it before a shower thinking if it wasn't what I wanted it would come off. Nope! It stayed on and looked great afterwards. Next morning was perfect as well. Maintenance wise, I would do touch ups during the evening ritual so as not to be rushed in the morning. Buy it, you'll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is not what is promised but the ease of application is worth it
customer_reviews.text: This stuff doesn't work as promised. It is NOT water proof. I have to apply it everyday. HOWEVER, it works well and is super quick to apply. I save so much time using this over my eyebrow pencil (which is a high-end brand). All of my products are of a brunette color. This, I will need to exchange for a darker shade. It is waaay lighter than expected. I would not call this shade brunette. I give it 3 stars for the ease of application and how great my eyebrows look with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Best brow product
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy this is to use and how it stays in place. I am 65 & my eyebrows are all silver and invisible. I also have an old scar inside my eyebrow where the hair doesn’t grow. After I put this on and brush my brows with the included spiral brush, my brows look great! It makes so much difference-my brows look natural. I love that it comes in Auburn-that’s my perfect color! (Most other brow products only come on blonde, brown or black-none of which matches my coloring).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this at first considering it's a bit pricey BUT I'm glad I did. I have really sparse eyebrows and oily skin BUT it does last all day even when sweating which is great. It does not smear at all but I wish it would last until the next day but hey, it does last me one full day so I'm not complaining. I apply it with an eyebrow brush so I use a tiny bit of product each time which means one tube will hopefully last me awhile. I suggest watching lots of "how to" videos on YouTube to get an idea of how to apply it properly.
customer_reviews.author: MariaTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great for thin brows due to medication!
customer_reviews.text: I have never been happier with a brow product! I'll restate what some others have said: use the brush applicator only to apply product to your own narrow makeup brush. Use short strokes as you would with a pencil, and then use the spoolie brush before it dries. The spoolie will create fine lines in any product that's directly on your skin, giving the appearance of little hairs. Two or three light coats gives a much more natural look than one heavy one. I have very sparse brows due to both past over tweezing and chemotherapy, and Wunderbrow gives a very natural look, plus it wears extremely well, even though I perspire quite heavily. (Again, thanks, chemo!)
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca V.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I use when I really want my eyebrows perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally fall for these gimmicky products, but I ordered this a few years ago and loved it so I just bought another. It works unlike any brow product I’ve seen, adding a lot of color, but also keeping your hairs in place. It sort of hardens, but not in a fake looking way. In fact it looks more natural than brow gel, I think. It is also waterproof, but is easy enough to get off with oil based makeup remover. My advice is to not apply it directly with the applicator, but instead use a small tapered brow brush and dip that into the product, and then apply.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Larson

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: My sister uses this for days at the pool, beach, and lake, along with sleeping at night sometimes. This product is very waterproof, and won't move much when swimming or showering. Soap alone won't take it off--you need make-up remover to completely remove it. When sleeping with it on, it often smudges. She has light brown eyebrows, and used to use the brunette color, but it was too dark. The blonde is more appropriate, but would be too dark for someone who is actually blonde.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Zagorski

customer_reviews.title: I REALLY wanted to love this, but the application is not as easy ...
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY wanted to love this, but the application is not as easy as it looks on the countless social media videos...the consistency is almost watery-like, so I don't understand how you are supposed to apply this to the sparse areas of your eyebrows. You have to do several coats, and by the time it dries, you look like you have leftover clay mask where your eyebrows should be. Product does last, but not as long as they claim [especially if you have oily skin]. It will last 1 day if you're lucky. And it's not dark brown at all.... it's more like an olive color...
customer_reviews.author: TriniGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great for summer days!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for a day on the water! I use it when we go out on the boat or by the pool. I have yet to spend a dawns a day IN the pool so I can’t say for certain how it would hold up. I believe it will stay in place based on how long it stays on in the bathtub though. The brush looks like a mascara type brush which I believe could be replaces with a smaller eyeliner type brush to be more precise, but it works ok. Overall, I will keep a tube of theirs product on hand all summer for smudge free brows!
customer_reviews.author: MMM5

customer_reviews.title: I think the product worked awesome, I have purchased it twice
customer_reviews.text: I think the product worked awesome, I have purchased it twice, the first time I purchase Brunette it was too light then I purchased black/brown but it still could have been a little darker! I would apply and then use a little darker powder over the top. But the product would last all day. I always had a tendency to wipe off half my eye brow with my regular eye brow pencil and this product would stay on through rain, and sweat. The only down fall was it lasted about 45 days and got to thick to apply. Think for the price and don't want to spend 22 dollars every forty five days for eye brows.
customer_reviews.author: chatums

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product for hot and humid summer days because it’s sweat proof and doesn’t rub off. However, it’s important to make sure when applying this that you use a good brow tool for application (not the one that comes with it) because it can be messy. It does take a few practices before you get the hang of it. Also, make sure your brow area is free from any oil or product that might make the product not stay. Once on and dry it doesn’t rub off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I was confused on applying the product, I didn't know to wipe it off (as seen on videos) or leave it on (as seen on videos). I applied a lot and tried the wipe off method and it looks grey/brown and horrendous. I tried the leave on method with applying a light amount (as directed on box) it looked a lot better but the color was too light and still grey looking or either I have really bad eyesight. I'll try jet black next time.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Everyday
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used another eyebrow makeup ever since I started using Wunderbrow. The only downfalls are that I had to get a separate little brush for application because their's suck and sometime the makeup has a hard time staying on bare skin if there is absolutely no hair in that part.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it works too well?
customer_reviews.text: On the one hand, this stuff really is waterproof, to the extent that it is very hard to get off, even with oil (note that how long it stays on depends on how oily your skin is). However, I found it hard to apply in moderation, and with it on thick for days at a time, it made my already sparse eyebrow hairs dry and brittle. It seems like some people are happy with this, but I stopped using it after a couple weeks after getting frustrated with it.
customer_reviews.author: Pascal Matheis

customer_reviews.title: This does work!!!!
customer_reviews.text: For the first time in 12 years I came out of shower with my eyebrows still in place!!!! Applying it with the brush it comes with is almost impossible I bought the brunette because I didn’t want to be too harsh or too dark but it actually was a bit lighter than I thought but I added a bit of my darker brow powder and mixed the two and use different my own brush to apply it and it stayed on all day . Survived an hour and half of workout and a shower!!!! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Nicki.A

customer_reviews.title: Remove excess color ASAP - PRACTICE - and have all of your working tools i.e. Qtips & makeup remover ready to go !!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST eyebrow color yet !!!! My advise would be to buy an eyebrow stencil and pick the one size you like. Make certain that all excess color is off the brush and slowly drag it across the stencil. Check your brow while you are applying and use Q-TIPS to remove the excess color because it dries very very fast !!! Q-tips & makeup remover are great for removing the extra color. Once your brows are done......this color stays on for a good amount of time and you need not ever repair it during the day. It does take practice but you will love it so do NOT give up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not meet expectations
customer_reviews.text: Was super excited to get this in the mail but it did not meet my expectations. It was hard to use even after watching 100 "how to" videos I still couldn't put it on correctly. It was blotchy and uneven in color. Even after I thought it looked decent, it did not last at least days like how it claimed. It wore off over night and looked even more like a mess then next day. I could say however though that it was some what water proof and didn't come off so easily once it dried, had to use make-up remover.
customer_reviews.author: dee y

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I've used WunderBrow for years. It used to be so hard to find. I'm glad it's on here now. I have microbladed eyebrows but in between refills I use this. It's great with my dark hair. I'm not sure how the blonde would work but the dark brown is amazing. If you're on the fence give it a try. (I have also tried the WunderBrow fiber eyebrow stuff and it's terrible. It fakes all over your face and leaves you looking half crazy.) Stick with the original.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: It DOES stay on for 3 days!
customer_reviews.text: I have "half brows" due to childhood stupidity. Someone suggested that I have them tattoed on but I have seen too many people with "old" brows that have turned bluish grey over time. But since this product wasn't a life changer financially I thought to give it a try. The directions are not for everyone who is not pretty handy with makeup, etc. I had to devise my own method but once I got the hang of it, it really does stay on. And it will come off with oil based makeup remover so you don't have to worry about making a mistake. And I live in a beach community so am in the water frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Everything I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: So at first I must say I did apply it wrong but thank goodness for the wunder brow cleanser. So reapplied it more sparingly and with less product (it dries fast) and I have achieved the brows I wanted I cleaned up areas with a brush dipped in the cleanser for a more cleaner look so I can definitely say I love it!
customer_reviews.author: KayBee

customer_reviews.title: Product is ok, Colors are off
customer_reviews.text: The product goes on well and is easy to use. I bought the blonde color because I needed to darken light sparse eyebrows--but this is really dark for a blonde product. Really dark. If you are blonde or a light red, who wants to fill in and match your brows, this is not the product for you. Seriously, it looked terrible and did not match my hair color at all! I thought the color chart was way off. Not light blonde at all--although it looks that way in the tube. This would be more suitable for someone with medium brown hair looking to fill in their brows.
customer_reviews.author: christine coleman

customer_reviews.title: Not as Expected
customer_reviews.text: I tried using this several times, whoa tacky eyebrows. I do not like this at all as it is a waste of money and time. I bought I for my sister at the same time, and she does not like it. Very difficult to put on, you cannot be in a hurry. Does not stay as stated if you moisturize your face. The brush is thick and bulky and creates lines that way. There are much better products out there, please do not waste your money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: tillygky

customer_reviews.title: Blonde color fades in a day
customer_reviews.text: I'm a blank canvas blonde...no color at all in my lashes or brows. After a lifetime of brushing in color every single day, and discovering Wunderbrow, I wistfully wonder "could it be true? Could I really only have to apply eyebrows once or twice a week??" Well, no. Another of my life's dreams shattered. The blonde color did stay on and it looked very natural, but only for a day. I followed all directions--apply to clean oil-free eyebrows, and only wash with oil-free cleansers--but no luck on day two, which was pretty much faded and back to square one on day three. For daily application, it's a good color for me, except the expense will prohibit me from buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me, did NOT stay on!
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for me. My face is very oily, and it kept on coming off. It never really stayed on. I tried the suggestions of ensuring there was no lotion or oils on the hair or the skins around the brows, and still, would wipe off faster than many of the other (cheap and expensive) brow products that I have. I did like the shade that I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: NBG

customer_reviews.title: A bit of learning curve, but works great!
customer_reviews.text: It took me several attempts to get the hang of Wunderbrow, but I've finally mastered it. I had to switch to a more professional eyebrow brush and not use the included applicator wand to achieve the natural result. That allowed for more control of application, hence 4 stars and not 5. Still, now that I've got the method down I'm very happy with the results! Stays on as advertised, and is more natural looking than the gels and pencils I've been using. Will definitely continue using!
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: 2000% great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have! Stays on all day! Even after work, gym, sauna, everything. Stays put and looks gorgeous. PS- IF BUYING MAKE SURE TO PURCHASE A PINPOINT BROW BRUSH FOR APPLICATION AS THIS ONLY COMES WITH A MASCARA BRUSH AND WHAT APPEARS TO BE A LIPGLOSS APPLICATOR.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. I was blessed to have clear eye brow hairs and very few of them. Without drawing my brows on daily I look like a chemo patient. This product is a god sent. It really is waterproof, don’t go rubbing the heck out of it when you get it wet but you can swim be in the rain and not expect the your brown will change locations on your face. It takes so practice to fill in your browns and the applicator isn’t my go to I can use it in a pinch.. but a brow brush is smaller and easier to do the details of a brow.
customer_reviews.author: Jojobrn

customer_reviews.title: Wah? to WHAT?!
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box. I see a tube of color and a spoilee. Oh great I thought ... this is going to end badly. No directions ... ok let’s swing it. So I put a dab of color on the spoolie and WHAT?! This stuff is magic! It only went on my brows. No bleeding to the skin or smudging. And my brows look amazing. You can’t even feel it’s on like some others that just feel like lead globs of coloring above your eyes. I’m glad I took a chance and went for this!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Most long lasting brow product I’ve found.
customer_reviews.text: Ignore the wacky picture but it’s the best selfie I have without doing my eyebrows right now. Color shown is dark brown/ black. I’ve learned that depending on your skin tone it can appear lighter or darker. It definitely has a warm tone to it and is much more brown then black. Love it. You have to be very precise. I usually use my Anastasia brow brush to apply. If there are any mess ups you need to wipe them off immediately or else it’s gonna stay like that. I wipe my eyebrows off with an alcohol pad before applying and then the brows usually stay 4-6 days.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to wash off with soap and water (which I ...
customer_reviews.text: I think any color may look a little off when trying to match blonde - it is just difficult. The product is tricky to apply. I used a very slanted brush but it did get a little patchy. It stays on though, just as advertised. It was easy to wash off with soap and water (which I appreciated b/c getting the shape of the brow is difficult and I needed to wash off and try again). I might not order it again, but I can imagine how this would be great for someone with darker, fuller brows than mine.
customer_reviews.author: B.Quiet

customer_reviews.title: Really Stays on!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really stays on! I've tried a variety of brow products and even Anastasia's pomade slid right off within a few hours. I have combination-oily skin and very sparse brows. WunderBrow can look natural or dramatic depending on your application and will still be on at the end of the day when I take my makeup off. I've even worn these to sleep, working out, and to a massage and it didn't budge! I apply it with an angled brush and you can easily wipe off mistakes with a q-tip before it dries.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Life (and time) saver!
customer_reviews.text: Used to spend 15 minutes or more on my eyebrows, now I spend about 5 minutes and don't have to worry about it smearing throughout the day. Since I have very oily skin, it is very easy to take off with my daily cleanser, but it lasts through the day which is worth 5 stars to me! I gave this product 4 stars because oddly enough, not sure if it's related, but since using my brow hairs have been falling out. I notice at least one while washing it off and I'm gentle about it. Since, I have acquired a small bald spot on my left brow which is probably only noticeable by myself, but the product covers it nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria T

customer_reviews.title: Best eyebrow product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eyebrow product I've used so far. Based on other reviews stating that the brown was too dark, I changed my selection to blonde just before ordering. I'm glad I did. It is dark enough to shape my brows and make them stand out. The gel goes on easily. When I brush them with the included brush right after applying the gel, I get natural looking brows that stay in place all day. I received the product on time and in excellent condition. I intend to reorder this product from the same company when this tube runs low.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Boop

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It takes some practice in application, and I would recommend applying a light amount to the base of the brow and brushing upward, then coming back and stippling areas where you are "bald". I also finish or touch up with a brow pencil. But it stays on for days and is certainly water proof. On day 3/4 it's coming off in spots from you natural oil, but its saves me so much time and really leaves your brows nice and in place.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t really like this product. It starts out ok. Then it gets really thick and lumpy and even when working rather quickly. The color is ok, I got the brown black and it’s light but does get dark when you add more... but then it gets lumpy so maybe I need a darker color and use a bit less product. Anyways it doesn’t last as advertised bec I washed my face at the end of the day and it came off. I do have oily skin so maybe someone with dry skin might have better luck.
customer_reviews.author: andrew langefeld

customer_reviews.title: At last - a brow filler that looks natural and lasts
customer_reviews.text: I have tried about 792 different type of brow fillers because mine are sparse. This product really works. It gives wonderful, convincing coverage and lasts for a couple of showers. To completely remove it, you'll probably need to use eye makeup remover or your existing cleanser might do the trick. The added benefit is that it also works wonder for touching up those little grey hairs that might appear at the brow line.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanna

customer_reviews.title: Want bold, shaped brows? This product is for you.
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for people that want bold, shaped eyebrows. I used the gel to fill in the eyebrows that I already have so my experience is from that standpoint. I used a tiny angled brush from ELF, and worked slowly. This picture is from my first time using the product. I used the jet black color after reading the disappointment users had with brown/black just being a chocolate brown. I wish there was a softer black, as I would prefer that but over all I'm happy and the product works as stated.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMan

customer_reviews.title: Give it a shot !
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised with several things about this product. I liked the color I purchased their brush and together the product goes on and looks better than other brow products I've tried . Use sparingly, I put it on tip of the brush and build up from their It does stay on all day . I take my makeup off at night and takes oil to get it off. I like the product and think it's worth a try
customer_reviews.author: sheila rider

customer_reviews.title: Microblading? No, GET THIS!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, this is to all the women considering getting your brows microbladed!!!... get this first!!! The application lasts up to 4 days depending on if you use oil based products above or on your brows! It best applies with a very fine angled brush, NOT the applicator that it comes with!! It is also best to let this product fade and come off of your brows naturally, do not scrub...as that causes the skin to release the precious brow hairs! It is darker than I anticipated, but once it dries it does tone down a bit. Definitely worth the purchase if you are looking for a low maintenance brow routine WITHOUT spending the $$$ of a microblading treatment!
customer_reviews.author: Shea Blakely

customer_reviews.title: Brow Gel works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product stayed put after application but the brunette color is very light brown and did NOT mix well with my dark brown eyebrows. It definitely does take practice to use this product as it's a thick consistency. Doesn't fill in the bare spots as a typical liner pencil or brow pomade but you'll learn how to apply better with more use. Returned Brunette color for a Brown-Black color instead. My hair is dark brunette but I guess my eyebrows have more black in them.
customer_reviews.author: JCarnes

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!! @onsecondthoughtgigi
customer_reviews.text: OBSESSED! I love this product so much and I can’t leave the house without it. I have not done microblading yet so this has been my go to. It truly is smudge proof and waterproof. I would use pencil before but I would find myself wiping it off or my kids rubbing it off. 😆 But THIS is so good! It comes with the little brush that helps define the brow line. Grab this fast! I use the medium brown. Follow me on IG @onsecondthoughtgigi for more reviews and recommendations.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi C @onsecondthoughtgigi

customer_reviews.title: True to its claim
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I was browsing Clinique products so I mistakenly thought it WAS a Clinique product. It is not. That being said, however, it does perform as advertised. It goes on smoothly and immediately gives the brow pretty intense color. It lasts approximately three days even with washing the face every night. It's kind of much when applied, so I try to remember to use it the night before or day before I'm going somewhere. It looks a little more natural the second day.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I used this once and it lasted all night. It came off when I washed my face but it held up very well while I was out. It was actually lighter than I thought it would be but it may be operator error. I did NOT use the wand - I put it on a slanted eyeliner brush. I used thin layers so they would dry well. Once it is dry, they stay put. I actually swatched it on my hand and it stayed even after several hand washings - it came off with oil. It was definitely worth the price and I will be continuing to use it.
customer_reviews.author: FlashBender

customer_reviews.title: Better than any other eyebrow product
customer_reviews.text: Diddo.. diddo.. diddo.. get an angled brush.. and practice.. practice.. practice.. FOR ME it definitely does NOT last the 3 days it claims it lasts.. BUT it stays on ALL DAY without touch ups.. which has NEVER happened with any other product before so I HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT but it is hard to learn how to use it... once you are over the frustration it’s blissful love for the product
customer_reviews.author: Chunky monkey

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: For dark hair, neither the brown/black or datk brown color match at all. Does not work well if you don't have a lot of eyebrow hair. Goes on very liquid and doesn't cover well. For sparse brows it looks like you took a marker to your face. May be best to fill in already thick brows.Best product for sparse brows is the Annastsasia brow pomade.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: I'm no Renoir, but I managed to get a nice look.
customer_reviews.text: The "Frieda Kahlo" review made me laugh out loud but also made me want to try the product. If it sticks well, yeah! If it is slightly difficult to put on, well go slower. I used a smaller brush than the one in the tube just to make sure I didn't over-paint myself. I love the finished look and need the long lasting finish. I've had my sad little eyebrows tattooed on at least 7 times and my skin just sucks away the ink like I suck down chardonnay! In just a couple of months its like nothing was ever there. Enough pain! I'll take a one to two day fix and save myself some money and some agony.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Brunette Created a Gray Color Cast
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this stuff. First of all I got the wrong color for my brows (my mistake and that's not why I'm giving it 2 stars) which was Brunette. This gel is very hard to put on your brows to make them look natural. It's clumpy. Also, I had a picture taken of me in a dark room so the flash went off and my brows looked gray! There was a hue of gray instead of the brown you see for Brunette. My mom tried it too and it's closer to her hair color but she didn't like it either. It does last a long time though.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi V. Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: With an eye brow brush, it is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have white blonde eye brows. I got the blonde color. The product can be built to increase the color however if you put less product you can match any shade of blonde hair color as to not have dramatic brows if that's what you are going for. Would definitely recommend getting an eye brow brush to put it on as the wand is thick and makes it very difficult to get a precise line. With the use of an eye brow brush this is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, poor applicator
customer_reviews.text: The color is as expected, and the product stays put... does not come off...seriously...you have to wash it off, it will not come off by itself. I took off one star due to difficulty with application. The brush that comes with it is not easy to use AT ALL...pretty much useless...so I bought the additional brush sold seperately by Wunderbrow, and found that it will not fit inside the Wunderbrow tube (the handle is too thick?? seriously??) Anyway...I had to resort to using another brush with a slimmer handle, but I find this inconvenient, and I don't understand why they wouldn't include a better applicator.
customer_reviews.author: M.R.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It’s the best for matching my color. Doesn’t smudge and isn’t rubbery. I’ve used others that say they’re long lasting and they’re rubbery and rip out my brows when I try to remove it. It theyre sticky. This one isn’t any of those things. Just wish it had a brush attached so I could apply it more easily. They sell a brush but I would prefer a mascara type brush
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Torkelsen

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: I'm on the fence about this product. They claim it takes two minutes to apply. Let me tell you it takes waaaaaayyy longer then two minutes. My biggest gripe with this product is when I remove the product from my brows i noticed that I'm loosing a good amount of brow hairs. I like that it last two days but it's not worth loosing the hairs on my brows.
customer_reviews.author: OC

customer_reviews.title: Brows lasted all day in the sun and water
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts about Wunderbrow, but after seeing all the promotional ads on Facebook I decided it was worth a try. I have very thin eyebrows so this products been a game changer. It really actually does last the whole day -during vacation I was in the sun and water all day and my brows stayed. Also the color is great, it's hard as a dirty/dark blonde to find brow gels or pencils that match
customer_reviews.author: HaleyReviews

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Eyebrows are the thing nowadays. I am obsessed with getting the perfect brow. A very clean look but natural looking. The Wunderbrow kit is wonderful! It comes with a brush. I first line my brow with a pencil and then I use the Wunderbrow to fill in the areas of my brow that is sparse. I then use the brush to make sure that all of the hairs are in the right place. The best thing about the Wunderbrow is that it does not smudge. I tend to rub my face throughout the day and the product stays in place and does not smudge.
customer_reviews.author: Lanette

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting but the extra brush is inconvenient b
customer_reviews.text: I’m practicing. This product goes on with an “eyeliner” style applicator then you use a mascara style applicator to brush it into your brows. It’s inconvenient to have the extra brush lying around so I found a little ziplock bag to keep them in. I feel like you don’t need the eyeliner style brush but the other brush doesn’t stay in the bottle. The product itself is great and long lasting. I like it. I hope I don’t look like Joan Crawford but hubby says my brows look nice so I’ll take his word for it.
customer_reviews.author: DANA PARKS

customer_reviews.title: What a shame...
customer_reviews.text: I am a black female med/dark complexion. I ordered the black/brown b/c I felt the any darker and it would be too intense. I was wrong. The color I received was a light brownish color. I put it on and it was an ashy color. I took a picture but it looks dark and not so ashy. The pros are it that it is easy to apply, dries fast and smugde-free. I was able to take it off using coconut oil. I'm going to try the jet black color and hopefully that is the one.
customer_reviews.author: MzMaxxy

customer_reviews.title: Where has this product been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: I was seriously apprehensive about a gel brow filler. The thought was scary. I have very light colored, thin brows. But this is very easy to apply, and it can be corrected if you make a mistake as long as you do so quickly. This product lasts forever, so there's no need for multiple applications a day. Love it! Would recommend using a brow brush with it, but it's still doable with the applicator.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: HAS TO BE SOMETHING BETTER!!
customer_reviews.text: Clumpy and thick. Goes on way to heavily even after wiping brush on the top of tube. Hard to use due to amount that gathers on the brush. Not a good product for brows. Seller provided quick easy delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not  for redhead brows
customer_reviews.text: I have almost white eyebrows and without some kind of product, I look very weird. Pros: stays on, can look natural or more Instagram glam based on your application method Cons: very tricky to apply, the blonde shade is too cool for red hair, pricey, messy application Bottom line: If you are skilled at painting on brows, give this product a try. For my more natural look, though, it doesn’t work. I returned it
customer_reviews.author: RedheadwalkingTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: It's very hard to find an auburn shade of brow mascara. The mascara part makes it look so much more natural and, although it takes time to learn how to not be too heavy handed, once you do this is great. It will also last into the next day unless you scrub it off. I do reapply a bit everyday though but at least you don't look like you have no brows. This is my go to and I hope they never stop making it.
customer_reviews.author: Natick2010

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Natural
customer_reviews.text: If your hair color is black;the wunderbrow color black/brown is your best choice. The initial color in the tube is deceiving; mud. I am pretty good with accenting my brows and desired a natural brow application that wasn't so deep dark.I have thin brows and I needed a fuller look without appearing exaggerated. Once I applied to my brows (of which I have a few gray strands) the color immediately blended with my original natural brow color. I was pleasantly pleased. I have used many types of brow apps and this is the easiest with no worry of fading or brushing off.
customer_reviews.author: progress4

customer_reviews.title: Only for Painted-On eyebrow look!
customer_reviews.text: Unless you want to have painted on eyebrows, don’t buy this product. It actually is a small paintbrush that is impossible to apply only to the hair, so it goes on to the skin too, looking like a magic marker. Once it’s on, it feels like a plastic glue-like coating on every single hair. (So it’s definitely smudge proof). It felt like if I scratched or rubbed my eyebrow once it dried, it would just yank out the hairs like brow wax. I could barely get it off except by massaging a large amount of oil into the eyebrows repeatedly and letting it sit for hours before cleaning with soap twice
customer_reviews.author: Brian Wallis

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This lasted me all day at the water park where I went on water slides, swam with dolphins, snorkeled, and went zip lining. I get super insecure without my eyebrows and this reassured me for long lasting brows. I apply this and then use my nyx setting spray with it. Just don’t rub and try not to touch your brows at all throughout the day if you’re swimming or doing water sports.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia V

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I work 2 jobs...and will do my makeup first thing in the morning and need to last all day into the night. Which is why I spend so much on makeup besides just for clients. Doing makeup & hair for a living...I love this product. However...I don't like the blonde color. It's too warm. I just don't know why every blonde eyebrow filler has to have a goldish tone. I need a true ash...since I am a true blonde. First, I apply this with the applicator. Then let it sit for just a min. Then I brush it for a more a natural look. Overall...I love it...just not a fan of this color at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindal Farwick

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I should have read more thoroughly. This was my mistake for not liking the product. I thought this was a eyebrow tint and is NOT. You are to apply product on brow and leave it there for up to 3 days. Sorry not on board with that, I wash my face nightly and apply my night time skincare routine. Per the instructions, you are not supposed to apply anything oily on or near the eyebrow or it will remove the product. I even tried it for a one day eyebrow gel type of product and it just made my eyebrows look stiff and wiry.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Stay Put Color!
customer_reviews.text: Best eyebrow gel that I have ever used. I'm in my 50's with thinning eyebrows and turning white also. This gel goes on easy and stays on through hot steamy days until you wash it off. Color is natural looking also!!! I cannot recommend this product enough. Whether you want a little color or a heavy dark color is all up to you. Just let dry in between coats or put one heavy coat on. I love the brush that gives you that natural look.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly D Stoneman

customer_reviews.title: Color is dark and not really waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to try this product out after seeing so many reviews. But I think it really depends on your skin type for this to work. It was not waterproof on my skin. I applied it and went to the pool and it did not stay. It did hang on a bit longer than the non waterproof brow fillers I've used so it might still work for some. Recommend using another brush to get a more natural look.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and actually stays on until you wash it off with soap!!! The applicator it comes with is like a paint brush so I do suggest you use an angle brush to apply and make sure your eyebrows are brushed out because they will stay how you apply once dried. I got the black and it works perfect I’ve actually got a few compliments and it looks nice and dramatic but clean!! You can still have an ombré look if you only underline your brows and brush up instead of filling in the front. I would definitely buy another very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Worst brow product I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe how much I hate this product. I had fairly high expectations, and none of them were even close to being met. The formula is way too thick, the applicator brush is useless, and there is nowhere to store the angled brush/spoolie. I tried it for a week, and I found that it came off throughout the day, definitely didn’t last through one night, and looked flakey. I am thoroughly disappointed. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: SmithA

customer_reviews.title: The blonde is a good color
customer_reviews.text: I have dark blonde hair and I highlight it so my eyebrows are probably technically a dark blonde color. Although a lot of people go with darker brows I am super glad I got the blonde color. It’s really easy to put on and looks natural. You can build up on the color if desired but I just put a little on, use the brush and go. I think it’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Stine

customer_reviews.title: Wunder Brow
customer_reviews.text: wish you could control how much comes out of container once taking the stick out.. product kinda clumps all on the brush once you pull the mascara stick out. I wouldn’t say this product is 100% waterproof, it has smeared on me.
customer_reviews.author: Michellef

customer_reviews.title: NOT a game changer
customer_reviews.text: It's an okay product. It had a ton of hype but you can get very similar if not better at the drugstore that would cost you $4.99 and above. The colors available are a bit tricky but ease of use is good. It is NOT SMUDGE proof or waterproof as it claimes. Also, when you wash your face with soap and water, the product would rub off without any effort.
customer_reviews.author: josie

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and runs out fast
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, it is not worth the price tag. In my opinion, the advertisements for this product over exaggerate. I do not recommend. This product will dry out like mascara does. Looking at the tube you think you will have enough to last a year, but it will dry out before you can use it all. This product will stay on throughout the day but will wear off overnight. It’s easy to apply with a brow brush and is not meant to be applied with the applicator in the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Long-wearing product, but clumsy applicator.
customer_reviews.text: Stays on very well, even through a few hours surfing. Comes off easily with alcohol wipe. The applicator is not so swell tho...makes a very heavy, globby mark, which you'll find out soon enough. You'll be there trying to get it right for quite a while if you don't go get a small angled brush. I recommend blotting the brush tip first, then draw your lines.
customer_reviews.author: Laura N.

customer_reviews.title: Great product when used with extra brush
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product but you have to buy their application brush to apply it. Using one that is in the bottle would be very challenging since it’s all covered in product. Use very little of the product on a separate brush and use a combination of small strokes and the eyebrow brush side to create a natural look. I clean my application brush after every use to keep it soft. Hope this helps :)
customer_reviews.author: OLShopper

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re anything like me you hate when your eyebrows look great in the morning but halfway through the day they begin to disappear! This product will NOT do that to you just make sure you clean your eyebrows with alcohol before applying it for best results! Best Buy EVER!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: WUNDER2 WUNDERBROW Waterproof Eyebrow Gel for Long Lasting Makeup, Auburn
product_meta.description: Color:AuburnWUNDERBROW contains an exclusive blend of hair-like fibers, combined with specifically treated pigments designed to fasten onto skin and hair. This Hair Fiber Complex is then fused into our PermaFix Gel to create a flexible matrix, locking the natural color and hairs onto our brows. The results are natural looking, perfectly shaped eyebrows that last for days. Traditional brow pencils, powders can be hard to apply, have multiple steps, can lock unnatural and don't stay in place or last throughout the day. Some women are so desperate to brows they go to the extreme of "eyebrow tattooing." This process certainly lasts but often looks unnatural, is painful and expensive. WUNDERBROW is a new solution which allows women to easily fill, define and shape their brows with natural looking color that lasts until they decide to take it off. WUNDERBROW gives the convenience of the perfect brow, at home, and in one easy step.
feature_bullets: Get natural looking brows with this long-lasting, waterproof eyebrow gel - our best brow product for flawless brows that last!
Define, fill & thicken brows with WUNDERBROW Eyebrow Gel - like a gentle eyebrow tint, it lasts for days but without the commitment of brow dye!
Natural Looking Eyebrow Gel, infused with ‘Hair-Like’ Fibers to fill, sculpt & shape brows
Upgrade from your standard eyebrow pencil: WUNDERBROW is completely waterproof, smudge-proof, transfer-proof, & sweat-proof for confidence that lasts.
Made in USA. Vegan Formula. Wunder2 is Cruelty Free certified by Leaping Bunny - the best way to know that your makeup is not tested on animals.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
